mapper.select: select i.*,p.topicname topicname,ty.tname tname,s.staffname staffname from t_information i,t_staff s,info_type ty,t_topic p where i.topicid=p.topicid and i.authorid=s.sid and i.tyid=ty.tid ORDER BY i.releasetime desc limit #{start},#{rows}
select i.*,s.staffname,s.staffimg,s.stafftype,s.staffinfo from t_information i,t_staff s where i.authorid =s.sid and i.infId=#{infid}
select count(*) from t_information t,t_staff s where t.authorid=s.sid and s.sid=(select s.sid from t_information i,t_staff s where i.authorid =s.sid and i.infId=#{infid})

select t.* from t_information t,t_staff s where t.authorid=s.sid and s.sid=(select s.sid from t_information i,t_staff s where i.authorid =s.sid and i.infId=#{infid}) ORDER BY releasetime DESC limit 0,3;
select * from t_information where infid =(select max(infid) from t_information where infid in(select infid from t_information where infid <#{infid}))
select * from t_information i,t_staff s where i.authorid=s.sid and s.sid=#{sid} ORDER BY i.releasetime DESC
select i.*,t.topicname,t.topicimg topicimg from t_information i,t_topic t where i.topicid=t.topicid and t.topicid=#{topicid}
select * from t_information i,t_staff s where i.authorid= (select authorid from t_information where infid=#{infid}) and i.authorid=s.sid
select count(*) from t_information i,t_staff s where i.authorid=s.sid and s.sid=#{sid}
